name: Learn Tenses in Hindi ~ English Grammar in Hindi
description: Learn Tense in Hindi ~ English Grammar in Hindi is an application to learn tense and all english grammar in hindi language. If you have better knowledge about tense you can start Speak English in 30 Days very easily no need to use Hindi English Translator to know the meaning of english language. Learn English fast and easy no need to take Spoken English Course in Hindi.   Everyone knows that tense is called the basic of english language. If anyone wants to correct his/ her grammar must needs to know tense and english to hindi dictionary words. In this application we have brought tense in hindi and english with examples and also hindi to english dictionary words . In our country, India today it is necessary to know English very well for getting a job or in daily uses. For that you have to know tenses, learn English Grammar in Hindi and Tenses in Hindi to become well in english.   Lots of people start to learn English Speaking or English Speaking Course even they dont know tense. Before anyone start simple english speaking course must needs to know tense. On the other hand many people search for English Speaking tutorial in play store for those people. This english grammar hindi application is the best for Fluent English speaking who start from zero and wants to learn English in hindi in 30 days. So hope it will be great helpful for learning English speaking and writing    ( Angreji vyakran )                                 ()                        ~                                                 Angreji vyakran or graamar seekhane ka pahala step hai tense ko bahut achchha se seekhana. Agar kisee ne tens achchha se nahin seekhega to angrejee samajhana aur angrejee bolane ke lie bahut hee mushkil hoga. Grammar (vyaakaran) kisee bhee bhaasha ke lie atyant aavashyak hai isake dvaara ham bhaasha ke svaroop ko bhaleebhaanti jaan paate hai. kisee bhaasha ko seekhane ~ bolane tatha likhane ke lie grammar hee ek aisee vyavastha hai jisase bhaashaee svaroop ko lagabhag pahale jaise roop mein rakha ja sakata hai. ummeed hai is epleekeshan aap logon ko bahut achchha lagega aur isase aap logon ka vyaakaran ka gyaan aur bhee jyaada kar paenge.  Features of this tense in hindi and english application---- * Tense in hindi and english translation * You can use Daily Conversation Sentences English of Hindi after learning tenses in hindi.  * Speaking English with Hindi was never easier if you have no idea about tenses. * Learning English grammar could be easier if you initially get to know these basics. * Words english to hindi meaning * More words no need language translator * Easy english words meanings learning * Practice of translation from english to hindi * Learn grammar and word no need english to hindi translator * Hindi English Translator - English Dictionary words added   Present Indefinite Tense Present Continuous Tense Present Perfect Tense Present Perfect Continuous Tense  Past Indefinite Tense  Past Continuous Tense  Past Perfect Tense  Past Perfect Continuous Tense   Future Indefinite Tense Future Continuous Tense Future Perfect Tense Future Perfect Continuous Tense  NOTE: This learn english grammar app in hindi works totally offline.  So if you like this tense in hindi and english offline application give us feedback as 5* review.
